comments:
1. Create a new build.xml file
2. In the empty editor, press ctrl+space.
3. The following is dumped to the console. Nothing is written to the log:
Unhandled event loop exception
Reason:
Assertion failed:

The interesting part:

We were incorrecly attempting to add templates proposals when the only 
proposal for an empty buildfile that makes sense is the project proposal.
Fixed in AntEditorCompletionProposal.
I added a constant for the empty array of no proposals.

Test added to the CodeCompletionTest so we don't make this mistake again in 
the future.
